SEARCH
Package withLinkedList

Class Post

java.lang.Object
withLinkedList.Post
public class Post extends Object
The homework1.Post Class implements post object. homework1.Post object can be liked, commented, and includes content. Also, can hold who liked or commented itself.
Since:
2023-03-17

    • addLike

      public void addLike(int interactionID, int lAccountID)
      addLike function adds likes to post if user already liked, s/he can not like again
      Parameters:
      interactionID - INT value which holds unique interaction id
      lAccountID - INT value of account id which liked the post
